name: UPaperTileSet
doc:
A tile set is a collection of tiles pulled from a texture that can be used to fill out a tile map.

@see UPaperTileMap, UPaperTileMapComponent

TileSize: The width and height of a single tile (in pixels)
TileSheet: The tile sheet texture associated with this tile set
AdditionalSourceTextures: Additional source textures for other slots
BorderMargin: The amount of padding around the border of the tile sheet (in pixels)
PerTileSpacing: The amount of padding between tiles in the tile sheet (in pixels)
DrawingOffset: The drawing offset for tiles from this set (in pixels)
BackgroundColor: The background color displayed in the tile set viewer
